text: "Girlfriend Is Better" is a 1983 song by Talking Heads and is the third track from their fifth studio album Speaking in Tongues. It was released as a live single in 1984 for the concert movie Stop Making Sense. It went to number 99 in the United Kingdom and number 21 in New Zealand. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Funk rock songs Category:Talking Heads songs
title: Girlfriend Is Better
